title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Get the ultimate power tool combo kit with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver! This kit includes everything you need to tackle any project with ease. The DCD771 drill features a compact and lightweight design, a powerful 300 UWO motor, and a comfortable ergonomic handle for extended use. The DCF885 impact driver is also compact and lightweight, with a 1/4-inch hex chuck that accepts 1-inch bit tips and an LED light ring for improved visibility.

With 2 batteries and a charger included, you'll never have to worry about running out of power. The yellow and black color scheme adds a stylish touch to your tool collection. Plus, the superior LED foot light provides excellent visibility in any workspace.

Don't miss out on this high-quality power tool combo kit from DEWALT. Perfect for a wide range of applications, this kit is a must-have for any DIY enthusiast or professional contractor.Upgrade your tool collection today with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit!
